tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ownership (
    ownership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id INT,
    owner_id INT,
    token_id INT,
    ownership_start_date DATE,
    ownership_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE asset_ownership (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_id UUID,
    token_id TEXT,
    ownership_start TIMESTAMP,
    ownership_end TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ownership (
    ownership_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    owner_id UUID NOT NULL,
    token_id UUID NOT NULL,
    ownership_date DATE
);
